timeline.bodyText: Let's not return boolean: would be good to have some kind of wrapper type
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: I'd extract a method for this. Depending on taste, you could also process the stream more aggressively and/or use keyed-streams
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: if this is a bug in atlas code we should probably throw a SafeIllegalStateException
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: Let's have a comment here that this should only be used for timestamp bound checks: this would behave strangely if we did it on leader election based checks, because there is a semantic difference between null and no agreement because paxos phase two didn't happen
timeline.author: jeremyk-91
jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: This is empty if everyone is healthy. Is that by design? (If so that's fine, just make sure it is!)
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

replies.bodyText: Yes, as of now, the plan is to only react to health check violations. So, the list for healthy namespaceAndUse will be empty.
replies.author: sudiksha27

timeline.bodyText: The first 4 are one layer and the bottom 2 are another. I'd suggest having maybe a CorruptionCheckStatus that is one of HEALTHY, DIVERGED_LEARNERS ... and then a CorruptionStatus (this class) just has HEALTHY and the two DEFINITIVE_CORRUPTION ones
timeline.author: jeremyk-91
